backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores and manages video metadata (title, description, uploader, upload time, file size, blob reference) in a map, exposing CRUD and search operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping four product features (upload page, library page, download functionality, dark theme design) to their implementing source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the frontend codebase structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS color tokens for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with a root layout route wrapping a library route (/) and an upload route (/upload).
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page shell component providing a sticky header with logo and nav links, a hero banner with gradient overlay, a main content area, and a branded footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: TanStack Query hooks for backend operations: fetching all videos, fetching a single video, adding a video with blob upload, and deleting a video with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for a dark-themed design system using oklch colors with teal accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Video library page displaying all uploaded videos in a card grid with thumbnail, metadata, play/preview modal, download with progress, and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Video upload page with drag-and-drop file selection, title/description/uploader fields, chunked upload via ExternalBlob, and a progress bar showing upload status.
frontend/src/utils/videoDownload.ts: Utility function that retrieves video bytes from an ExternalBlob with progress tracking, then triggers a browser file download using a temporary object URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with Inter/Space Grotesk fonts, oklch-based color tokens, teal accent colors, custom shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking the app summary, existing implemented features, and pending feature requests with their requirement IDs and statuses for a video sharing platform.
